name: The End of Times
description:
Fight your way through the horde!  The End of Times Arena is a small demo to showcase the combat, movement and enemies for a larger project that's still being worked on.

Currently this is a small demo of a larger game that's yet to come.
includes:
- 3 maps of varying difficulty!
- 12 different enemies!
- Over 50 weapons!
- Over 20 armor sets!
- 2 different jetpacks!
- Unlimited bullet-time!
